entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to my blog! You can call me Dawn.
Have to say it’s a little hard for me to explore how to establish this blog.Anyway, it looks not bad now.
This is my first post. I’ll be happy if anyone can find it. I love sharing.
Let’s begin!

entry.title: one
entry.content:
It was in late 2019 that I was told I had to learn the knowledge of front end due to the requirements of our project. I’ve never been involved in this area before nor others in our group. So I began to study about it by myself. However, a few days later, I was moved to another group. It became unnecessary to go on. But I found that front end was really interesting and kept to explore it at my leisure even if my pace was slow.

Yesterday I tried to create this page, accually the very first doc I have read for studying front end told me to publish a page on GitHub like this. But at that time I couldn’t figure it out. What a good day! I eventually acquired my own page. I wrote my feelings and hoped I can stay enthusiastic.
